member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SIZE_RANGE
member.summary: Describes the range of supported sizes for a video scaler.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SIZE_RANGE.MaxWidth
member.summary: The largest output width to which content can be scaled. The largest value allowed is D3D12_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384).

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SIZE_RANGE.MaxHeight
member.summary: The largest output height to which content can be scaled. The largest value allowed is D3D12_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384).

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SIZE_RANGE.MinWidth
member.summary: The smallest output width to which content can be scaled. The smallest allowed value is 1.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SIZE_RANGE.MinHeight
member.summary: The smallest output height to which content can be scaled. The smallest allowed value is 1.
